name: Tomb Lord

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in the Arena by 42%.

skills.name: Crippling Blows
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff on the target for 2 turns if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Death Burst
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 70% chance of placing three 5% [Poison] debuffs on all enemies for 1 turn if the target is killed by this attack. This skill always inflicts a critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Blight
skills.raw_description:
Resets the Turn Meter of all enemies with less than 50% HP. Has an 80% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Also has an 80% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
